alert.note: Alert for Coastal Martin; Inland Martin (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 16 at 3:21PM EST by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Martin County through 345 PM EST... At 320 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Jonathan Dickinson State Park, or near Hobe Sound, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Tequesta, Jupiter Island, Hobe Sound, Port Salerno, and Hobe Sound Beach. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Conditions are favorable for the development of brief funnel clouds. On rare occasions they can briefly touch down, producing wind gusts over 50 mph. If a funnel cloud is spotted move indoors and report your sighting to the National Weather Service.
